titleStmt.title: An help to the duty in, and right improvement of sickness. By Henry Newcome, M.A. minister of the Gospel
titleStmt.author: Newcome, Henry, 1627-1695.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Thomas Parkhurst at the Bible and Three Crowns in Cheap-side, near Mercers-Chappel,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: An help to the duty of right improvement of sickness.
Reproduction of the original in the Congregational Library, London.
